profileAlternative.name: Don Zhao
profileAlternative.headline: Director and Consultant (BI and SQL Server) at Intellidata Solutions (Consulting Services)
profileAlternative.summary:
Over 20 years extensive IT and business experience (focusing on database and BI), and help customers to design and improve data solutions. Provide practical BI road map and approach to create insightful business information out of raw data for better business decision and productivity.

Specialties: Data Modeling, BI Evangelist, BI Project Planing and Design, including business discovery, BI project management, data modeling, data science and data analytic, ETL/ELT design and implementation, reports and dashboard Delivery. SQL Server Architect/DBA, T-SQL Guru. Database Performance Tuning Expert.

given.text: Ambe always works in highly profession way. With excellent communication and understanding skills, Amber really took key role in the process helping me and my family to relocate to China from North Ameria back to four years ago....
